H0.text: Magnetic fields are generated by charged particles in motion.

H1.text: Fission is what charged particles in motion generate.

H2.text: Electricity is generated by charged particles in motion.

H3.text: Gravitational fields are generated by charged particles in motion.

A4.text: All moving charged particles produce magnetic fields.

A5.text: Magnetic fields are produced by moving electric charges and the intrinsic magnetic moments of elementary particles associated with a fundamental quantum property, their spin.
